___

> 報名資格

  國立臺北大學在學學生。
  
___

> 團隊限制

  可跨年級、跨系組隊，每隊以2~4人為限，最多12隊，額滿為止。 

___
> 報名期間

  108年1月7日至2月24日。

# 表單
<!--html_preserve-->
<form name="submit-to-google-sheet">
  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="exampleFormControlInput1">Email address</label>
    <input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleFormControlInput1" placeholder="name@example.com" name="email2">
  </div>
  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="exampleFormControlSelect1">Example select</label>
    <select class="form-control" id="exampleFormControlSelect1" name="option">
      <option>1</option>
      <option>2</option>
      <option>3</option>
      <option>4</option>
      <option>5</option>
    </select>
  </div>
  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="exampleFormControlSelect2">Example multiple select</label>
    <select multiple class="form-control" id="exampleFormControlSelect2" name="multipleoption">
      <option>1</option>
      <option>2</option>
      <option>3</option>
      <option>4</option>
      <option>5</option>
    </select>
  </div>
  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="exampleFormControlTextarea1">Example textarea</label>
    <textarea class="form-control" id="exampleFormControlTextarea1" rows="3" name="text"></textarea>
  </div>
   <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>
<!--/html_preserve-->
<script>
  const scriptURL = 'https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbyzK-PojQNOAyza7uMCDkOy9mHTubUAMGQxr8IN04APThz5bwU/exec'
  const form = document.forms['submit-to-google-sheet']

  form.addEventListener('submit', e => {
    e.preventDefault()
    fetch(scriptURL, { method: 'POST', body: new FormData(form)})
      .then(response => console.log('Success!', response))
      .catch(error => console.error('Error!', error.message))
  })
</script>
